website_summaries.verdict: This booster simply sits on top of a regular dining chair with no extra installation needed.
pros: Your toddler could carry this seat himself
Grips to the chair and also is textured to help keep your child from slipping off the booster
Extra support on the sides and back of the booster help keep your child from falling
cons: This booster doesn't work as well on soft chairs and cushions as it does on hard surfaces
It does not have an adjustable height

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Received this today. First of all the area where the child sits is NOT soft. The sides are soft...big deal. Where the child sits, it is quite hard. Second....the rubber/plastic on the bottom of this booster seat has at least three areas where it is peeling. WHO SELLS A PRODUCT LIKE THIS?! Received it today and returning it today! Gave it one star, because it's the only way I could post this review.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy for soft dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: If you have soft chairs like mine (pictured), don't buy this. It has a hard bottom and nothing "non-skid" so it slides all around. We returned it for obvious safety reasons. We didn't test it on a hard hair but the seat itself looked great. My kid loved sitting in it on the floor before we packed it back up but that's not what we bought it for so back it went.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pike

customer_reviews.title: Great for the independent toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my almost 2 year old who loves to sit at the dining room table. She still uses her high chair for main meals, so I didn’t want a booster seat with buckles, straps or big leg cut-outs. This is perfect, low profile, and easy for a toddler to get in and out of. It doesn’t slide around on our wooden chairs, so I don’t worry about it slipping off with all her wiggling. (It has some weight to it, so I wouldn’t take it traveling with us). It’s easy to clean, and she’ll be able to use this as she grows. Happy toddler, happy momma.
customer_reviews.author: GreytEscape

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to help our toddler bridge the gap from being to big for a high chair but not tall enough for the regular table. Is super easy to clean/wipe down and sits well on our kitchen table chair. Do have to be careful with a moving toddler that it doesn't tip over and off the chair. Prouduct itself is pretty sturdy (we haven't taken a bite out of it but it does have a little give/bendable when our toddler sways from side to side). Would recommend/buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is awesome! It stays out really well, even on our bench-style dining set. Other boosters need to be strapped down and only work on traditional chairs with a back. Our almost 3yr old can now enjoy his meals or activities at our dining table securely and comfortably. I am very pleased with this product and 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy to clean and comfortable booster
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this booster because it’s sturdy, very easy to clean and stays well on our cushioned dining chairs despite our very active 2.5 year old. It does move around on the chair a bit but haven’t had that many issues with it. I wouldn’t take this to travel because it doesn’t break down for packing and would be bulky and heavy to move around. I would recommend this booster to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not secure to the chair
customer_reviews.text: I like its simplicity. I was limited to a chair that sat a little lower than others to fit my toddler's legs under our low table, so I was stuck there, and this works from that aspect. But for the price, it's a little too simple. If it were $15 I'd probably be satisfied, but $35 makes this overpriced. No straps for the chair means the chair goes with my daughter whenever she climbs in or out of the seat. That's a hassle and also a potential safety hazard, so for now I am just staying very close and being very helpful. I typically love this brand, but this hasn't been a win so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Harju

customer_reviews.title: Creates more problems than solves them
customer_reviews.text: This does what you want it to - it boosts the child up closer to the table. However, if you have a smooth surfaced chair (ours are wooden with no covers) this booster is incredibly slippery. Our child is very proud of herself for getting into and out of the chair, and it petrifies me because the booster slides all over the seat. There is no way to tether it to the seat, and the grippers on the bottom of the booster do absolutely nothing, if not actually create the problem, to reduce slipperiness. Big disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Starr2882

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Arrived two days earlier than promised!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old used this seat at a friend’s house and loved sitting up like a big kid. Bought this one for our house and she loves being able to sit at the table with the rest of our family for meals. We still use the high chair for some things but the booster seat helps her feel more like part of the family when we eat! The tread is great and doesn’t slip and she can get in and out of the chair with little assistance (huge win). She also drags it to the living room to sit in when we’re watching television so it must be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: EJSEPT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for your "In-between" Toddler that have outgrown the standard highchairs.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and great padding for your "in-between" toddler. I bought two for both of my grandkids that have outgrown the highchair but still need to be bolstered up to the table. The padded seat make both of my grandkids very comfortable and so they don't slip out nor are they pushed under the edge of the table as they were in the highchair or booster highchair seat. LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: No straps and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My two year old grandson has decided he wants to eat at the table and not in his highchair. Because he is only with us a couple of times a month, I didn't want to have to deal with a booster that had to be strapped onto the chair. This booster sits nicely on the chair, raises him up high enough to eat comfortably, and cleans up so nicely. We can easily move it from one spot to another, and now my grandson enjoys eating with us at the table. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Transitioning to Eating at the Table
customer_reviews.text: Stays put on a wooden dining bench, lightweight but sturdy. The seat is textured to avoid slipping, but can be a challenge to wipe. I use a kitchen towel with dish soap, a paper towel just tears to shreds. But not having any nooks/crannies that food can gather in unnoticed far outweighs the minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: CC Baker

customer_reviews.title: Solid option
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and solid. The main problem I have with it is that it seems to trap the mess, as it's not very easy to clean. This is because of the grip, which means the kids don't slide around a lot but traps the muck. It's easily transported and the outside is easily wiped down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy booster seat in the right chair
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly on our kitchen chairs. They are wooden with a rounded back, so the the booster nestles in well and feels sturdy. The material is easy to clean. I’m not sure i would feel the same if the back of the chair was straight at the bottom. Color (gray) is as-pictured. Packaging also said this seat is available in more colors than what I could find here on Amazon. (We were looking for brown but ordered gray. Packaging did show a brown, but we kept the gray because it’s just a booster seat!)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We had a booster seat with tray that we had been using since my daughter was about 18 months old (she's now 4). It had been working well at our big table without the tray, but she started telling us that she was uncomfortable, and her legs were falling asleep! We tried without a booster but she wasn't tall enough. She's been so happy since this has arrived. She can get in and out of it herself (though she does have to hold it steady because it is not attached to the chair) and she's very comfy in there. Just the right height too. So glad we finally found a solution!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: stable, cleanable, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: works great for our 5.5 year old and 2.0 year old. have been using for 6 months now and even though there are no straps we haven’t had a single issue with slipping sliding or tipping. Also soft and rubbery and easy to clean. Not the “cutest” thing i ever saw, bit what kids stuff is.
customer_reviews.author: DKL81

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat primarily because there are no crevices and it is easy to clean compared to other booster seats. It doesn’t have straps to secure it in place but that is fine for our 2.5 year old but something to think about if purchasing for younger children
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Safety concerns
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, a little unstable since it doesn't strap to the seat. Wish I had bought something to strap in instead. Textured area does not clean easily or in some cases, at all without tons of elbow grease. My baby seems to act comfortable in it, but it worries me.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Good booster
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would clean a bit better. The seat is textured where my son sits, so he doesn’t slip. The texture makes it hard to clean. The sides wipe beautifully. I try wiping after each use, but sometimes it doesn’t happen. It is really soft and I don’t feel it will scratch my chair. Blends in well with our decor. My son likes it!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: This booster was exactly what I wanted for my 4 year old who just needs a little boost to sit at the table. He doesn't need to be strapped in, booster really doesn't need to be strapped to the chair, just a little height plus I liked the simple design. Unfortunately, it slid right off my upholstered chairs, very little grip at the bottom of this seat. Might work ok with a wooden chair but a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: dac1517

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booster!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect booster! We use this at home inside and outside. I like that it doesn’t have safety straps but I’m confident my 2 yr old is fine without them. It has a nice color and shape and cleans up well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son needed to have something that was less restrictive than a high chair. This is gripping the wooden dining chair securely so I'm not worried about it sliding off without straps. Climbing into it is a little harder though.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Webb

customer_reviews.title: Gives our toddler the perfect boost while eating!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect booster seat for our toddler! It’s durable and easy to clean and the traction on the bottom prevents it from sliding off the chair. Exactly what we needed for our 3 year old who has outgrown a high chair but just needed an extra boost while at the table
customer_reviews.author: lauren slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, stable.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly stable, won't slide off a chair once your kid is sitting in it. Need to make sure your chair is wide enough to support the whole base, though. Run it under cool water and scrub gently to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Madon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My 15 month old prefers to sit at table with us over the high chair so we gave away the high chair as soon as we got this booster. It’s a million times easier to clean with no little crevices or fabrics to clean. It’s sturdy and simple.
customer_reviews.author: LA Bae

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for years!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve have one for 4 years now and it still works great. We’re about to buy another one now for my second child. Only complaint is that if you have a wiggly child, the seat may move a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Preshah

customer_reviews.title: At home booster.
customer_reviews.text: Great booster for at home! We keep this on the same chair for our 3.5 year old and it’s just enough boost to get him up to the table, and sturdy so he doesn’t topple over. I wouldn’t recommend for travel, but for at home use its great!
customer_reviews.author: Emma H.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not awesome
customer_reviews.text: This functions as a booster seat but doesn’t wipe clean as well as I’d like. I end up washing it over the sink which is a pain. My 2 year old hates it and refuses to use it about 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would slip around on our chairs, but it doesnt. So easy to clean since you can just pick it up and dump crumbs into the trash, and it's nice that I can move it and use the chair it's on when I want to (as opposed to having to unbuckle the other types of chairs. It seems comfortable, the kids haven't complained. I'm sure I'll be buying another one when the littles get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Tama Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Booster seat that has many functions.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it great for my great granddaughter to be able to reach the table to ear but light weight enough for her parents to carry it along to the movie so she can sit and see the screen. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole K. Leissner

customer_reviews.title: Great little seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat for our 2 year old transition from a high chair. We have a little eat in kitchen. The only thing was had to put a pillow underneath to boost it up to the table alittle.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Nice subtle color for adult spaces with kids but texture of seat collects food
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my toddler to help transition him from the high chair. He suddenly stopped wanting to sit in the high chair but the table is still too tall for him to comfortably eat there. This seat is nice because it blends in with the adult furniture in our dining room. However, with all the ridges in the seat, food sticks very easily and is not easily cleaned out. For whatever reason, my toddler doesn't love this and 9/10 times opts to sit in the high chair now.
customer_reviews.author: JG17

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: This seat has caused more headache than worth for me. I have only used a small handful of times and the surface is not very non-slip nor any way to attach to a chair. My toddler can climb into it from the side by way of another chair pushed close but when she sits she has almost fallen out of it several times. The seat slides over top of our chairs and topples onto the floor very easily. Not very impressed with it. Might be better if you have some sort of non-slip mat underneath. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranya

customer_reviews.title: Best booster seat we tried
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several booster seats, and this is by far our favorite. The material is both very easy to clean and clings to most seat types well to prevent sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and they are great! Comfortable, sturdy and easy to clean. We have had one of them for awhile now and it still looks brand new !
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not soft at all.
customer_reviews.text: NOT SOFT FOAM. Everywhere in the description it says soft foam. It is not soft at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bkntx16

customer_reviews.title: Ok booster seat
customer_reviews.text: The outside of the booster seat is very easy to clean however the seat is made of some porous material and that is a bit harder to clean up. It works best on wide chairs since there no way to secure it and it usually slides from side to side. It is portable and that’s a plus but still hard to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great help during meals with a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster chair for my grandson to eat at the table like a big boy! Sturdy, doesn’t slip or move when he figits. Very easy to clean and easy to move. He also enjoys sitting on it in his play tent as a chair. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: great product.  love no straps and no buckles.  cleans easily.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, soft to the touch but still firm. Easy to clean with a wash cloth, the texturized portion on of the seat is more difficult to wipe off spills but just takes a couple more swipes of the washcloth. (Maybe we should clean it more than once every other week.... hah). Our two year old has no trouble climbing up onto the seat for meal time. Initially worried that there were no straps to secure to the chair but the seat doesn't move at all in the chair thanks to the secure feet. Also, glad there are no straps to buckle children down with, they would just get in the way and covered in spilled food.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good little booster!
customer_reviews.text: Got this little booster for my 2 year old. It works great, holds up to all my 2 year olds squirming, wipes off fairly easy and doesn't slide off the kitchen chair too easy. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C Hixon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Booster for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for home use and have been very happy. Our 17mo. old child is now even more involved in mealtimes. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a booster. Keep in mind this product is only for hard surface chairs. If you have a cushion, it is not safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for our 3 year old so our youngest can use the high chair. She loves it. It's small and minimal and doesn't slide around. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great alternative to a high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great alternative to a high chair, perfect for that inbetween stage between baby toddler to growing toddler. Easy to clean, nothing to take apart, and made of rubber, so it doesn't hurt when the child sits on it for long periods of time. We have taken to leaving one in the trunk to go with us to restaurants, and it's worked out very well. My child wiggles and move around quite a bit and hasn't fallen out of the chair yet!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat, stays put on our wooden chairs and doesn't slide around. The texture of the seat makes it difficult to wipe clean and it looks much dirtier than our Soft Gear booster seat. I would have purchased another Soft Gear seat but was looking for something without annoying straps to have hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Saint

customer_reviews.title: Soft and perfect height
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this booster seat for their bar stools and I loved how sturdy and soft it was, so purchased one for our dining room. My grandson is 2 years old, climbs up without help, booster seat stays put, and he's very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: We love this booster!
customer_reviews.text: I searched far and wide for a booster for my two year old. I thought that this looked like the best one, and the price was not too bad. I was right! My favorite thing about this booster is that it is very easy to clean! No nooks or crannys for food to get stuck in. It wipes clean very easily. I also like that it is low profile and not offensive looking. The seat does not slip off the chair and feels pretty sturdy. I think that this chair is the best value to price out there. I just ordered a second for the grandparents' house!
customer_reviews.author: Jelemo

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOSTER SEAT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat because I was so sick of cleaning around buckles and straps and crevices of all kinds in the other booster that I had. No matter how much I “cleaned” that thing, it was never fully clean. This seat is so much easier to keep clean, comfortable for my girls and it has held up so well. I bought one two years ago for my first daughter and recently bought a second one for my other daughter because we liked it so well!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy booster for active 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Debated for a long time on the purchase of a booster seat due to so many reviews so I will throw my hat back in the ring at other readers. The item was bought for its price and a 2 year old who likes to sit in a booster. She would not have done well with a buckle system. I debated the other foam booster but for the limited meal time we spend in the chair this price and functionality is perfect. I tossed it in the car on a road trip with family and I am glad we had her seat to enjoy family meals. Good luck shoppers--there is a ton out there!
customer_reviews.author: HAGA Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 2-3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this, easy to clean for the most part (little bumps for traction where she sits sometimes need to be run under the sink), very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S Karges

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent booster! Very comfortable and easy to transport. Perfect night. Kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Slips off the chair
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cheap looking seat. But the reason I am giving it 2 stars is because it is very slippery on the bottom and slides of the chair if the child moves even a little. I have another seat made by a different brand and I can compare. I would not reccomend getting this product, but I guess it’s not the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Lyalya Nikolaeva

customer_reviews.title: Booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at our dining room table, it’s great durable and easy to clean. Perfect for our toddler who just turned 3.
customer_reviews.author: AGG

customer_reviews.title: Ease of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I live this product. This is my booster seat to help me see out if the vehicle , lol
customer_reviews.author: Ms. 66666

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for all who want to get rid of their high chairs
customer_reviews.text: With my son getting older and wanting to sit at the table and eat this seat is perfect! It puts him at the perfect height and also gives him a sense of independence. The material of the seat is so durable and soft at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: durable and comfortable product but unfortunately too low of a profile for us to use
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: This can be used as a booster and on the floor chair for my grandson visits
customer_reviews.author: Laserlil

customer_reviews.title: Great booster
customer_reviews.text: Great booster. The “seat” part of the booster has a slight grip on it and needs to be cleaned with a damp sponge rather than paper towel otherwise lint from the paper towel will be left behind and you won’t get it entirely clean. Other than that it’s perfect. My 5 year old daughter can get in and out of it easily. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended me to buy this. And it very soft. Good for the baby. And once get dirty just use some cleaner. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this purchase. My 2 year old twins were in the fisher price booster seat and i could tell that they were ready for a more "big kid" seat. This one is the perfect height for them even though they are still young. Plus there is room to grow. It seems very durable and easy enough to clean with some scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Tried a few others but these are so easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these. Tried a few others but these are so easy to clean .. and not visually onerous. There are no safety features (seat belt for the child or straps to attach to chair) so it's better for a slightly older child (our son was 2 1/2 when we started using it)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: We love this booster seat except it slides easily off the chair. I knew it wouldn’t stay put without a strap but I thought it might have some sort of a grip on the bottom but it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hedman

customer_reviews.title: Good without a strap
customer_reviews.text: Stays good on our chair without a strap. Slightly heavy for travel but easy. Mainly easy to wipe down
customer_reviews.author: Bwest

customer_reviews.title: We love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Just bought for the second time. We love this seat! Our first has been through a couple kids, many years and tons of trips and is still in great condition. Works well for the 3 yr old who needs lots of height, and even for the 6 yr old who still wants it.
customer_reviews.author: RZippy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again to use in an RV.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay! I bought it to use in the RV to boost my toddler with the RV dinette, and in that case it doesn't work well. It sits so low that it doesn't get the kid to a height to bring her close enough to the table top to aide in the eating process or to be able to color or play. She ends up kneeling or standing awkwardly and the booster ends up stored on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Cracked seat, less than one week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this seat. Easy to clean, comfortable, stable on the chair (no slipping). However, we haven’t even had it a week and I noticed there is already a crack in the seat. I have two more kids for this thing to go down the line with and so far, it isn’t looking good. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable boost
customer_reviews.text: So great! We always had a strap-in chair insert instead of a high chair to save space in our tight kitchen table area. However, there was no place to tuck the straps and buckle as my daughter got older, and she started complaining that it was uncomfortable to sit on. We got this booster hoping it would still give her the height she needed, and so far so great! It could be an inch taller, but it still works well for her with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for about 2 years now and it works great. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: weekend rider

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you have the right chair.
customer_reviews.text: The product isn’t the perfect height for our 3 year old. However there are no straps to secure it to the chair. Also it is just small enough that it can actually fit through the open back of our chairs.!
customer_reviews.author: sumkat

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to clean , my toddler loves it. Perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanyy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent booster seat. Works perfectly for children ages 1 through 4 -- raising them from a normal table chair height to a suitable height for them to eat at the table. Designed so that it easily slides under the table and is very easy to clean (no cracks or crevices to catch and hold food stuffs). We have two, have used with multiple kids, and are thoroughly pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Seat, But Unstable
customer_reviews.text: A nice seat that has a good color and strong, stable build. The biggest problem I have with the seat is that there's no way to secure it down. This means if your little one is climbing in and out of the seat by themselves (and probably leaning on the sides), there is a very real danger of it tipping over on the chair and the child falling. We actually switched back to a booster seat that can be tied down and will only use this one as overflow when we have guests.
customer_reviews.author: ReubenET

customer_reviews.title: love it, we own 2
customer_reviews.text: We currently own 2 of these. I purchased a green one about 2-3 years ago. And just recently purchased the grey one for grandma and grandpas house. I love that it's super easy to clean. I just toss it in the sink and spray it down...let it sit for about 10 minutes and the wipe off any smears or chunks of food. It's nice that's it's a foam material so when my son goes to move it ...it can bounce if it hits the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Blue

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Basically indestructible, non-slip, easy to scrub down, and it's cushy to sit on!
customer_reviews.author: Texas_attitude

customer_reviews.title: Nice boost
customer_reviews.text: Color is great. (dark gray) Super easy to clean Comfortable to kids Durable - lasted through two boys. I wish it had a little more back support but that's being nit picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booster chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one purchased in our family. Our 4 year old granddaughter loves it, its very comfortable, and very important stays put because its a no-slip material. Will last through many children.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great booster
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old was protesting the high-chair and although he is tall for his age (36.5") he still needs a boost to sit at our table. Be aware there are no straps (to the chair or child) but it really cuts down a toddler squirming alone in a chair. The grippers on the bottom are really no slip on wooden chairs., he has climbed into it alone with no problem and most importantly, sits contently for a good amount of time!
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean. No sliding issues
customer_reviews.text: Daughter hated her high chair, but to short to sit at the big table. This was perfect. Perfect height, easy to clean, and no issues with sliding like some of the other reviews mention.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat cleans well and it sturdy and does not slip on our bench
customer_reviews.author: fin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to clean booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: I like this booster for its cleanability, sturdy yet somewhat soft foam plastic is easy to wipe down or rinse as needed. It works well for our three year old son. The only complaint I have is that there's no strap to keep it on the chair. I knew that when i bought it but I didn't know how much i would want a strap until now. When my son gets off the seat, usually over the side, the whole seat tips and he always almost falls down or the seat falls off. Would be nice if a strap was an option but I still like it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JMZim

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice, soft comfortable chair for toddler, but my nephew would not sit in it. I like that it’s low profile and that it comes in colors that match my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Good solution
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while now. Quite durable, easy to clean and my 4-year old can easily move it to a different chair on his own when he needs to. Will definitely get another one once my daughter outgrows our large booster.
customer_reviews.author: Mattmoon9

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Not really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were straps to secure it onto a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smells like chemicals and it's not comfortable for their back, would no buy again nor recommend
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great booster option
customer_reviews.text: Great booster! We have had this for over 6 months and haven’t had a single problem with it. Cleans well, not sure why you’d travel with it???
customer_reviews.author: Elsha

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his seat
customer_reviews.text: We were having such a problem getting our son to sit down for dinner at night ( almost 2 years old). This really helps him sit and stay better. It is easy to clean and light weight. I really like the look too. It is so hard to find anything kid orientated that isn't brightly colored. When my son was first getting used to it, I wished it strapped to the chair because he would pull it down when trying to get up, but now there is no problem he climbs in and out on his own.
customer_reviews.author: nana nana boo boo

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek booster. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 1/2 yr old so he could sit at our dining table with us at meal times and it works great. Sits nicely on the wood and doesn’t slip. Very easy to clean, usually hose it down or wipe it. Very happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Benitez

customer_reviews.title: I actually like that there are no buckles
customer_reviews.text: After having a Booster with lots of crevices that made it impossible to keep clean of crumbs, this Booster is fabulous. I actually like that there are no buckles. Perfect for my 2yr old who doesn't need to be buckled in. So easy to pick up and wipe crumbs into the sink. Clean in 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Saves chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a booster seat that wouldn't mark up my painted wood chairs. I found it! It stays in place, though I wouldn't recommend​ it for a squirmy toddler. My daughter is 3 and sits well at the table so this suits her well to give her the extra height to actually see what's inside the bowl she is eating!
customer_reviews.author: JLong

customer_reviews.title: ... for nearly two years and it has held up great! I love that it's big enough for an ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this seat for nearly two years and it has held up great! I love that it's big enough for an older child to use as well. My 9yr old son will occasionally use it while doing school work because it sits him high enough that it makes writing much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy, easy to clean and seems comfy. However, I am using this with a 2 1/2 year old. He is a climber and will quickly climb out taking food with him. I used a belt strapped around the chair for a while to keep him in his seat. I finally gave up and got another booster for him---one with seat straps. Now he stays put when that is important. This booster will probably be my choice in a few years. He does use it around the house to sit in and "read." It is a great size for his little legs.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my toddler at the dinner table. I do wish I could strap the seat to the chair somehow so it wouldn’t slide off while he tries to climb into it, but I’m sure he will get it on his own in due time 😁
customer_reviews.author: Gina V.

customer_reviews.title: oxo and this booster seat and this is by far the best. Easiest to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have a fisher price, oxo and this booster seat and this is by far the best. Easiest to clean, stays put on chairs and the comfiest. The others are hard plastic and this has more cushion to it
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Dont think twice about it. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My 2 1/2 year old loves it. Very durable, doesn't slide. Worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maricruz Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this booster seat. I bring it to restaurants because it is softer and more comfortable than the ones they provide.
customer_reviews.author: M. Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Height for Kitchen Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for both my 5 year old (almost 6) and my son who just turned 3 years old. It accommodates their different sizes perfectly. Now they can both sit at the table with the rest of the family during meal times. Bye bye high chair and counter chair. Hello boosters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great booster
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great booster for our 5 year old at the dinner table. Keeps her legs from falling asleep during meals. Easy to clean and store as needed. Easy to travel with for our toddler when we go to other homes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spica

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for 3 years and it still looks brand new. Easy to clean, very solid material, durable and travel-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat for older children.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great for older children that don’t need to be strapped in but just need it for a little extra height at the table. The material is a little rubbery so it stays put on the chair & is comfy for the child. Very easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. I thought it might slip around because it didn't have a strap, but it stays put. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ajl

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This booster is easy to clean and lifts my son up to just the right height to eat at our table. It doesn't hook onto the chair, but does have wide base, so even when my son gets goofy and plays around in his booster, it is not about to slide or tip off the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Mae

product_meta.title: Prince Lionheart Soft Booster Seat, Charcoal Grey
product_meta.description: The soft booster seat is perfect for meal time, TV time or anytime. It is waterproof, portable and slip resistant. The soft booster is made of light density foam for comfort. The soft foam protects furniture from scratches and easily wipes clean.
feature_bullets: Seat that gets the job done while feeling good and looking great
Non-slip base, lightweight, easy-to-clean, waterproof, soft foam boosterSEAT
Textured seat to keep from slipping and sliding
Indoor or outdoor; meal time or family time;3 years+; seat weight: 2.7 lbs / 1.2 Kg
Provides a 3 inch lift; measures 5 inches high on the side and 7 inches high in the back
